original_text: These were the waters of Meribah, where the Israelites quarreled with the Lord and where he was proved holy among them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와와 다투었으므로 이를 므리바 물이라 하니라 여호와께서 그들 중에서 그 거룩함을 나타내셨더라

sentences.original_text: These were the waters of Meribah,
where the Israelites quarreled with the Lord
and where he was proved holy among them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들 가운데서 거룩함을 증명하신 곳이었습니다.
